"I've always liked the idea of having a tiny servant." Wendy says to Mabel with a smirk as she sits down behind the cash register, setting Mabel on the counter.

"And what exactly would being a t-tiny servant entail?" asked Mabel nervously, looking up and putting her index fingers together. Wendy rests her elbows on the counter and leans forward, towering over the shrunken girl. "Oh you know. Feeding me snacks, scratching itches, givin foot rubs, basically doing anything I want you to."

Mabel's blood runs cold, and she forces out nervous laughter. "Heh heh heh, that's a really funny joke Wendy."

"I think we both know I'm not joking buddy," replied Wendy. "And speaking of giving foot rubs, I had to walk all the way here, and my dogs are killin’ me." Wendy leaned back in her chair and plopped down her dirty boots on the cash register.

“Let’s get these off,” she said, grabbing her boots and pulling them off to reveal her pale bare feet beneath them. They glistened with sweat, and the smell emanating from them was bad enough at normal size, let alone at only a few inches tall.

“C’mon Wendy, just get Dipper to massage your feet. Im sure he’d do that if you asked him,”
Mabel suggested in a last-ditch attempt to bargain with the giant.

“Yeah, but at your size you can get into all the right places,” replied Wendy as she picked out lint from between her toes. The redheaded giantess looked over at Mable and gave her a wink. A shiver ran down Mabel’s spine. She tried to think of something else to say to escape her fate at Wendy’s massive feet, but all that came out of her mouth was “I- Uh- Wha- Yo-”

“Enough stalling pipsqueak, time to get rubbing,” Wendy said as she lifted up her feet and placed them on the counter. Mable was barely half as tall as the giant feet in front of her.

Mable took a deep breath, trying to ignore the pungent smell that came with it. After taking a moment to build up some courage, she ______________
1553222222222132122.title: At the feet of a ginger giantess
